name: The Dark Backroom (ReyGameDev)
description:
Description

The Dark Backroom Remake is a remake of my 2D backroom game.

Collect all 8 documents in the backroom and escape before it's to late.

Features

Here are the features that makes it different:

  • Horrific atmosphere
  • The enemy has 3D model now
  • Explore dark backroom area in 3D model

Controls

W/A/S/D: Move
